stations.name: NOVA FM
dj_lines: You're listening to Nova FM. Where the future sounds like the past.
That was Chrome Dreams. If you're driving with the windows down, this next one's for you.
Nova FM — painting the night in neon since 2019.
Neon Nina here. The city looks different at 3 AM, doesn't it?
Ninety-eight-seven, Nova FM. Your frequency for the night shift.
Close your eyes — wait, no, keep them on the road. But FEEL this next one.
We don't do daylight here on Nova FM. This is night music.

stations.name: STREET HEAT
dj_lines: STREET HEAT one-oh-three-one! Big Torque in the building!
Shout out to everyone hitting The Pit tonight. Y'all already know.
That track goes HARD. Like a turbo at full boost, you feel me?
If you ain't listening to Street Heat, you ain't listening.
Big Torque keeping it real for the streets of Nova Pacifica.
This next one goes out to every whip running on empty and still sending it.
One-oh-three-one, baby. Turn it UP.

stations.name: PACIFIC DRIFT
dj_lines: Pacific Drift... take it easy out there.
Smooth K here. No rush. The road's not going anywhere.
This one goes out to everyone driving home alone tonight. You're not alone.
Pacific Drift ninety-one-three. Music for the long way home.
Breathe in... breathe out... next song, coming up slow.
The harbor looks beautiful at this hour. Smooth K, keeping you company.
Life's too short to rush. Pacific Drift understands.

stations.name: REDLINE RADIO
dj_lines: REDLINE RADIO! Piston Pete keeping your RPMs in the red!
If your engine isn't screaming, you're not going fast enough!
That was Nitro Fury! Now FLOOR IT!
Redline one-oh-six-nine! Music that hits like a nitrous hit!
Piston Pete here — and I haven't slept in THREE DAYS! LET'S GOOO!
Your check engine light is on? GOOD. That means you're TRYING.
Rev it. REV IT. This next song demands it.

stations.name: UNDERGROUND
dj_lines: ...Underground...
Phantom. You know the frequency. Tell no one.
If you found this station, you're already one of us.
This signal doesn't exist. Neither do we. Underground.
...eighty-seven-six... the frequency between frequencies...
They tried to shut us down. The signal persists.
No ads. No sponsors. Just bass. Underground.
